message.body: Hey, it's Claire. We're hitting the road!
Just stopping for gas, only bad news is we've hit really bad weather and it's slowing us down :/
If it gets to be really late arrival, I'll letcha know and maybe we can just meet ya when you're up and at em?
We're still about fives hours out according to my phone. Wanna meet in the am? We can hit up darlings and explore a bit.
Well, I leave for work at 8:30...you can still just come here when you arrive, can letcha in and j will be around in the am
Thanks so much, lady. Sorry for the delay
No probes, just expect half opened eyes and mumbles :-)
We've just parked, a few blocks away.
Hey lady weve had an unexpected change in plans and won't be staying tonight. Any way we could lock up and leave the keys in the apt/mailbox?
I'm home until 7 if yr comin back by then?
